TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1,T2,T3,T4> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`4<T1, T2, T3, T4> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3, T4) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable
type Tuple<'T1, 'T2, 'T3, 'T4> = class interface IStructuralEquatable interface IStructuralComparable interface IComparable

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: 此元组的第一个组件的类型。

span.span: The type of the tuple's first component.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: 此元组的第二个组件的类型。

typeparam.name: T3

typeparam.span: 此元组的第四个组件的类型。

span.span: The type of the tuple's fourth component.

summary.span: 表示 4 元组，或四元组。

span.span: Represents a 4-tuple, or quadruple.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定数量和值序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 类表示 4 元组，或四倍，这是具有四个组件的元组。The class represents a 4-tuple, or quadruple, which is a tuple that has four components. 可以实例化对象通过调用构造函数或静态方法。You can instantiate a object by calling either the constructor or the static method. 您可以使用只读的检索的值元组的组件， ， ，和实例属性。You can retrieve the value of the tuple's components by using the read-only , , , and instance properties. 元组通常使用四个不同的方式：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 表示一组数据。To represent a single set of data. 例如，元组可以表示的数据库记录，并且其组件可以表示每个字段的记录。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 若要提供轻松访问和数据集的操作。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下面的示例定义一个数组对象包含棒球投手、 投球数和自责 （评分而无需调查的错误），数量的名称，并点击放弃了。The following example defines an array of objects that contain the names of baseball pitchers, the number of innings they pitched, and the number of earned runs (runs that scored without fielding errors), and hits that they gave up. 数组传递给`ComputeStatistics`方法，以计算每个投手平均 （放弃了 9 个局游戏中运行的平均位数） 上，并放弃每局的命中数的平均数。The array is passed to the `ComputeStatistics` method, which calculates each pitcher's earned run average (the average number of runs given up in a nine-inning game), and the average number of hits given up per inning. 该方法还使用这两个平均值计算假设的有效性平均值。The method also uses these two averages to compute a hypothetical effectiveness average. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 若要从无需使用方法返回多个值`out`参数 （在 C#) 或`ByRef`参数 （在 Visual Basic 中)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如，前面的示例在一个数组中返回名称投手，其计算统计信息对象。For example, the previous example returns its computed statistics, along with the name of the pitcher, in an array of objects. - 若要将多个值传递给通过单个参数的方法。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如，方法只有一个参数，可提供一个值，则该线程在启动时执行的方法。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果提供对象作为方法自变量，则可以提供具有四个项目的数据的线程的启动例程。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with four items of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外可以使用静态方法实例化 4 元组对象，而无需显式指定其组件的类型。You can also use the static method to instantiate a 4-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下面的示例使用方法来实例化一个四元组，其组件的类型， ， ，和。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 4-tuple whose components are of type , , , and . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.name: obj
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`参数被视为等于当前实例在以下情况下：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是对象。It is a object. - 其四个组件是与当前实例相同的类型。Its four components are of the same types as the current instance. - 其四个组件都等于当前实例。Its four components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认对象相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个数组在特定一天内的三倍的温度提供数据的对象。The following example defines an array of objects that provide data on temperatures at three times during a particular day. 调用方法来比较每个与每个其他对象对象。The method is called to compare every object with every other object. 输出表明方法将返回`true`仅当所有这四个组件对象具有相等的值。The output illustrates that the method returns `true` only when all four components of the objects have equal values. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Item1 As T1
public: property T1 Item1 { T1 get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以动态确定的类型组件在两种方式之一：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过调用`GetType`方法返回的值属性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索对象，表示对象，并从返回的数组中检索的第一个元素及其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个数组对象，其组分包含城市名称、 该月的一个月的年份和平均高温和低温。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain the name of a city, a month of the year, and the average high and low temperatures for that month. 然后，它将检索并显示每个组件的值。It then retrieves and displays the value of each component. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供用于比较的自定义规则的对象。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比较器将当前的 对象与指定对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置是在指定对象之前、之后还是与其相同。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.
Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance precedes .
Zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。

span.span: This instance and have the same position in the sort order.
A positive integer
This instance follows .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 虽然可以直接调用此方法，通常称为集合排序方法，包括通过参数集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，调用方法和方法对象，它通过使用实例化构造函数。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法应在排序操作中使用。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 它不应比较的主要目的在于确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象，调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组包含有关棒球投手统计数据的对象。The following example creates an array of objects that contain statistical data about baseball pitchers. 数据项目包括投手姓名、 音调投球，投手的平均 （投手允许每个游戏的运行的平均位数） 上和投手已放弃的命中次数。The data items include the name of the pitcher, the number of innings pitched, the pitcher's earned run average (the average number of runs a pitcher allows per game), and the number of hits the pitcher has given up. 示例显示未排序的数组中的每个元组的组件，对数组进行排序，然后调用按排序顺序显示的每个元组的值。The example displays the component of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display the value of each tuple in sorted order. 若要对数组进行排序，该示例定义了一个泛型`PitcherComparer`类，该类实现界面和排序以升序按其第三个组件 （平均） 的值而不他们的名字对象组件。To sort the array, the example defines a generic `PitcherComparer` class that implements the interface and sorts the objects in ascending order by the value of their third component (the earned run average) rather than their first component. 请注意，该示例不直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 隐式调用此方法数组中的每个元素的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: is not a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.Equals(object other, class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer) cil managed
Function Equals (other As Object, comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Boolean Implements IStructuralEquatable.Equals

param.name: other
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个对象，该对象定义用于评估两个对象是否相等的方法。

span.span: An object that defines the method to use to evaluate whether the two objects are equal.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值根据指定的比较方法指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object based on a specified comparison method.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 仅当调用实现`other`不是`null`，并可以成功地强制转换 （在 C#) 或 （在 Visual Basic) 转换为对象的组件的当前实例相同的类型。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法的第一次传入的值对象进行比较实现。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回`true`，方法是再次调用，传递的两个值对象。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 如果此方法调用返回`true`同样，调用的方法是第三个时间和传递的两个值对象。If this method call returns `true` again, the method is called a third time and passed the values of the two objects. 如果此方法调用返回`true`同样，第四个和最后一次调用该方法并传递的两个值对象。If this method call returns `true` again, the method is called for the fourth and final time and passed the values of the two objects. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`Item3And4Comparer`类，该类实现接口，并更改的方式对象计算是否相等。The following example defines an `Item3And4Comparer` class that implements the interface and changes the way in which objects are evaluated for equality. 此方法始终返回`true`传递时和属性值的两个对象和它调用`obj.Equals`方法来评估其属性值。The method always returns `true` when it is passed the and property values of two objects, and it calls the `obj.Equals` method to evaluate their property values. 此方法调用返回 true 时，它还调用`obj.Equals`方法计算的元组的属性值。It this method call returns true, it also calls the `obj.Equals` method to evaluate the tuples' property values. 该方法仅基于的值是否相等的测试结果，和属性。As a result, the method tests for equality based only on the values of the and properties. 输出说明了为数据集的结果记录该月的月的一年的时间和平均高和低温度的美国城市的名称的对象。The output illustrates the result for a data set of objects that record the name of a U.S. city, the month of a year, and the average high and low temperature for that month. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.equals/cs/equals2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.equals/vb/equals2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode(class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer) cil managed
Function GetHashCode (comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个对象，其 方法计算当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: An object whose method calculates the hash code of the current object.

summary.span: 使用指定的计算方法计算当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: Calculates the hash code for the current object by using a specified computation method.

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法只是包装调用`comparer`对象的实现。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应返回相同的哈希代码的两个被认为是相等的对象。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供实现类。This method provides the implementation for the class. 虽然可以直接调用该方法，最常调用的排序方法，如集合的默认重载和、 集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法应在排序操作中使用。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 它不应比较的主要目的在于确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象，调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 方法使用的默认对象比较器比较每个组件。The method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组对象的组件中包含一位棒球投手名称、 数投球，和的命中数和自责数。The following example creates an array of objects whose components consist of a baseball pitcher's name, number of innings pitched, and number of hits and earned runs given up. 它显示未排序的数组中的每个元组的组件，对数组进行排序，然后调用按排序顺序显示每个元组。It displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display each tuple in sorted order. 该输出显示，已按名称，即第一个组件排序数组。The output shows that the array has been sorted by name, which is the first component. 请注意，该示例不直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 隐式调用此方法数组中的每个元素的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回字符串的形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*)，其中*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*，并且*Item4*表示的值， ， ，和属性，分别。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*), where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, and *Item4* represent the values of the , , , and properties, respectively. 如果任何属性值为`null`，它表示为。If any of the property values is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example illustrates the method. 它将显示一个包含城市的名称、 该月的一个月的年份和高和低平均温度的 4 元组对象数组的组件。It displays the components of an array of 4-tuple objects that contain the name of a city, a month of the year, and the high and low average temperature for that month.
